uvi.description:
scsi: libfc: Fix array index out of bound exception

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.13.5 by commit 8511293e643a18b248510ae5734e4f360754348c. For more details please see the references link.
